text: On 16 March 2025, a fire at the Pulse nightclub in Kočani, North Macedonia, killed at least 61 people. Interior Minister Panče Toškovski said pyrotechnics caused the fire. 194 people were hospitalized in Kočani, Štip, and Skopje. It was the deadliest nightclub fire in Macedonian history and the deadliest nightclub fire since the 2015 Colectiv nightclub fire in Bucharest, Romania. == References == Category:2025 disasters in Europe Category:March 2025 events Category:Fires in Europe Category:History of North Macedonia
title: Kočani nightclub fire
